Author: Vlad_m
Title: [ANN][ICO]Corl - Revenue sharing on the blockchain
Body: Corl Bi-Weekly Update  - Corl Finilized Private Placement distribution model.  - We will be distributing our Private Placement via broker/dealers in the US.We had dialogs started with several VC funds For early investments.  - Major Announcement at Blockchain Futurist Conference 2018.  On August 15th and 16th, the Corl team packed their bags and headed to the Blockchain Futurist Conference in Toronto, the birthplace of Ethereum and hub spot for blockchain start-ups. The objective of the conference was to bring blockchain innovators, pioneers, and enthusiasts together to discuss the current state, trends, and future of blockchain technology. By the end, the conference attracted over 2300 participants and 128 speakers.  https://blog.corl.io/corl-update-at-blockchain-futurist-conference-2018  - Corl and Loopring Sign Memorandum of Understanding  Liquidity is one the foremost benefits of securitizing assets so, naturally, the CORL token will likely be listed on centralized and decentralizes exchanges. The Loopring Foundation is a blockchain agnostic open protocol for decentralized token exchange. Currently deployed on top of Ethereum, their technology allows developers and companies to build decentralized exchanges and/or implement non-custodial exchange functionality within their dApps. Loopring's vision of an agnostic system that empowers users aligns with Corl's mission so we are happy to announce we have signed a Memorandum of Understanding.  https://blog.corl.io/loopring-and-corl-sign-memorandum-of-understanding  - Corl Connects with Blockchain Industry group  Blockchain-powered, revenue sharing startup, Corl is excited to announce our alignment with Blockchain Industry Group (BIG), an organization that promotes the adoption of blockchain technologies and digital currencies through the active collaboration and promotion of their global blockchain community.  https://blog.corl.io/corl-connects-with-blockchain-industry-group

Author: aaa10247
Title: [ANN][ICO]Corl - Revenue sharing on the blockchain
Body: WEBSITE | TWITTER | FACEBOOK  | TELEGRAM | WHITEPAPER | BLOG | REDDIT   Corl Token Sale  Presale* *Limited to qualified & verified investors only  STO** **Pending Regulatory approval  About Corl  Revenue sharing on the blockchain.  Corl provides royalty financing to high-potential early-revenue companies. Our online platform provides companies with access to competitively-priced, non-dilutive, founder-friendly capital, and streamlines the funding process by analyzing transaction-level financial/social data.  Corl is planning to launch the world‚Äôs first regulated securities token on the blockchain, representing equity in the company, and paying dividends on a quarterly basis. CORL is the world‚Äôs first token to:  (i) leverage the power of blockchain technology to support and accelerate the growth of emerging growth companies through revenue-sharing investments; (ii) aim to achieve regulatory approval as a securities token; (iii) represent 100% equity ownership in a company; and (iv) issue tokenized dividends in ETH.  Unlike traditional tokens on the market, CORL‚Äôs value is derived from the equity of Corl, and is based on a profit-sharing model, whereby investors receive a continuous stream of dividends based on future earnings of Corl.  Corl will set a precedence in the financial services industry by initiating the evolution towards digitizing financial assets on the blockchain, and changing the way that early-revenue companies obtain funding.  See Whitepaper for more.     How Corl Works  For companies, the Corl platform is used to apply for funding.    For investors, the Corl platform is used to purchase and track investments.    Companies get access to the funding they need, and individuals participate in the growth of these companies by investing in Corl.      Team       Partnerships       Advisors      Facebook - here  Twitter - here  Linkedin Profile - here  Linkedin Page - here  Reddit - here  Telegram - here  Link to Website - here  Link to Whitepaper : here  Link to Bounties : Reddit  Twitter  Content  Facebook  Translations  Signatures
